name: Predator
overview: Predator is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player controls an eagle, which can move left, right, flap its wings to fly into the sky, and can shoot directly forwards. The player moves on a level with 2 trees of varying height each round. The player tries to shoot all enemy birds, and receives bonus points for leaves remaining on the trees when the level is finished. Some enemy birds can drop eggs which hatch even more birds, and there are also worms along the bottom of the screen which can injure the player. The player starts with 5 lives.
